title: Toronto Tech Wrap-up
details:
Details
-------

Celebrate a very successful year of the Toronto Tech and Start-up Communities. Hosted by many leaders of the communities as a thank you for all those that participated in the past year.

Tickets are $10 in advance, and will be $15 at the door (cash only at the door). All proceeds from the event will be going to the Daily Bread Food Bank through #HoHoTO as a collaborative gesture.

Come join us at The Courthouse for drinks, music, and all around celebrations! We’ll be giving those that supported the communities a little time halfway through the night to give recognition and thanks for being outstanding. This includes those that sponsored groups, held events, helped by providing venue space and more.

Remember to invite your colleagues out and / or show off that you’re coming out by sharing the link to the event using the hashtag #TOTechWrap.

Check out the event page and buy tickets on Uniiverse! ([http://sqz.co/d3KGi9y](http://sqz.co/d3KGi9y))
